title.rendered: Intelligent Signal Processing, Antennas, and Communications (SAC) SPECIAL TRACK

content.rendered: Communication plays a pivotal role in electronic systems. Topics in this track include, but are not limited to: (a) Signal processing for communication, Image/Video/Speech/Audio/Radar/Biomedical/Sparse/Graph signal processing, (b) Microwave devices, Antennas, Millimeter-wave/terahertz communications, 5G and beyond networks, (c) 5G and beyond communication systems, Quantum/Satellite/Optical/Space Communications, Energy harvesting, Green communication.
